entry.title: Italy Strips Some Gay Couples of Parental Recognition
entry.content: Prime Minister Georgia Meloniâ€™s government has moved to restrict same-sex parenthood as its champions traditional values.

entry.title: Turkey's Erdogan Faces Biggest Election Challenge Over Economy
entry.content: Once celebrated as the leader who lifted millions of Turks into the middle class, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is losing support over his handling of the economy as the rising cost of food, energy, medicine and other essentials unravel the standard of living for most people.
